detail_desc: Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels and a seam at the waist with ties.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Wide blouse in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top with a narrow tie. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in silk jersey with a round neck and vertical seam down the front.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves and a decorative knot detail at the hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut blouse in slub-weave organic cotton with asymmetric flounces at the front that continue around the back. V-neck with a raw, loosely overlocked edge, long balloon sleeves with diagonal seams and narrow ties at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top and appliqué on the turned-up edge.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist (except in sizes 12-14+Y). Zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with a frill trim around the neckline and pearly buttons at the back. Short sleeves with elastication and a frill trim.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.

Sleeveless romper suit in a patterned cotton crêpe weave with shoulder straps that have a sewn-on bow at the front and elastication at the back, and long legs. Press-studs at the crotch and along the legs in size 6-12M.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fitted skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back with a knot detail. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight wide legs.
Lace dress with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.
Three-strand necklace made of thin metal chains in various designs with pendants in metal and plastic. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
Lined bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Wide shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Long shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
High-waisted, stretch twill trousers in a viscose blend with a sheen. Fly with a visible zip and slim legs.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.

Short lace dress with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with an embroidered motif around the neckline and short frill trims around the sleeves.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with side stripes and wide ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Slim, ankle-length trousers in patterned imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and press-studs.
Non-wired push-up bra in lace and mesh with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Straight-cut blouse in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and long wide sleeves with a button and flounce at the cuffs.
Fitted top in stretch, textured jersey made from a cotton blend. Double-layered polo neck, a concealed zip at the back and extra-long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Witch’s hat in satin-covered felt.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in washed denim made from sturdy cotton with a turn-down collar and classic front with press-stud fastenings. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, a yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep neckline at the front.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, an imitation suede peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Long nightshirt in a cool, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, cuffed sleeves, and a gently rounded hem.
Coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap side pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and legs and press-stud fasteners.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in pattern-weave fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck and a V-neck at the back with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft velour with a decorative knot detail at the hem.
Trigger-clasp bracelets with different sorts of metal links.
Cotton jersey vest tops with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gently rounded hem.

Short, A-line dress in a patterned viscose weave. Wide neckline with wide smocking and short, wide sleeves. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Leggings in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement with an all-over print, elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Straight-cut, linen-blend jacket in a patterned weave with a shawl collar, padded shoulders and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Buttons at the front and front pockets. Lined.

Knee-length dress in a softly draping weave with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in a soft, fine modal and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in patterned, stretch cotton twill with a collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs and fake flap chest pockets with a fake press-stud. Unlined.

Padded jacket in sturdy fabric with a slight sheen. Faux fur-lined hood with a faux fur trim, stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud. Lined.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a visible seam down the front and a decorative knot detail at the hem.

Rectangular shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a short shoulder strap attached by chain and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Flap with a magnetic press-stud and a zipped inner compartment. Satin lining. Depth 4 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 25.5 cm.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in an organic cotton crêpe weave with frill-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elastication and a frill trim at the top, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems. Sizes 9M-4Y with an elasticated seam at the waist.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Blouse in twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a grandad collar, pearly buttons down the front and a tapered waist. Lightly padded shoulders, long balloon sleeves with pleats at the shoulders for added width, and wide, buttoned cuffs.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Sandals with open heels and toes, lacing and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
